ygData.subject: Re: lifetap
ygData.msgSnippet: HEHEHE Too true. I can just see hoards of lvl 22 + shadow knights running around after rats and bats to top up their health. 8) Inos Veeshan
ygData.messageBody:
HEHEHE Too true. I can just see hoards of lvl 22 + shadow knights running
around after rats and bats to top up their health. 8)

Inos
Veeshan


Grant Vanderhule wrote:

> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> NO. i've heard numerous people bickering about this on SK message boards
> too, and this is greed, not need. i know we are a frustrating class, but we
> are HIGH DIFFICULTY after all. get yourself up to lvl 30 or so and you will
> no longer care that you cant lifetap ;) besides, if they did give us
> lifetap, what would it do? give us another 6 hp per zap? judging by our
> other spells.. ;)
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
